It finds the desired token and queries the user's balance to ensure the user has enough and saves it by moving it from the userTokenBalances mapping to the userSavings mapping.","params":{"_amount":"The amount of tokens to save","_duration":"The duration for which to save the tokens","_token":"The address of the token to save"}},"spendAndSave(address,uint256)":{"details":"This function calculates the amount to save based on the spend percentage set in the user's plan, deposits the required funds from the external save"}},"withdrawFromPool(address,uint256)":{"details":"This function withdraws a specified amount of tokens from the userTokenBalances mapping pool to users external wallet.","params":{"_amount":"The amount of tokens to save","_token":"The address of the token to withdraw"}},"withdrawSavings(uint256,bool)":{"details":"Allows a user to withdraw their savings from a specific safe.","params":{"_acceptEarlyWithdrawalFee":"Boolean indicating whether the user accepts an early withdrawal fee","_savingsIndex":"The index of the safe from which to withdraw
